1: <pb/><e>A ton bit David ti' yet max elaj bay Absalón is c'ajol.</e> <pb/><t>Mamin Jehová, xiwil mactxel ajc'ul oc win, xiwil eb chi meltzoj oc win.</t>
2: <t>Xiwil eb chi aloni tol man ok in a colil yal eb.</t>
3: <t>Palta ayin xin ach Mamin, in Colomal ach, oj xan chin aj can; ach ton chak' in tec'anil.</t>
4: <pb/><t>A yet chin awji ayach, chin a tak'wej tac'al bay a tzalan yet ayilal.</t>
5: <t>Chin ay telanok, cax chin way ajok; watx'c'al chi yun yel in wayan, yujtol ach chin a taynej.</t>
6: <t>C'am chin xiw yuj jun miman bulan ak'om owal oyan ec' winlak ti'.</t>
7: <pb/><t>¡Mamin Jehová, ocan wetok! ¡Ach in Diosal, colinc'al! Ach ok a mak'tok sat eb ajc'ul oc win, ok a mak'on eltek ye eb unem yobtakil.</t>
8: <t>Mamin Jehová, ach ton chach colwajc'al. Ak' a miman watx'c'ulal jiban ayon a conob on ti'.</t>
